name: Lithuanian Vegetable Producers Association
goal:
promote the interests of Lithuanian growers at all levels of state and government institutions;
shape development of horticultural sector in Lithuania;
support high technological level and food safety in potato and vegetable production and marketing;
stimulate integration and co-operation forms within the members;
co-operate with Lithuanian and foreign partners on economic and technological issues;
assist the members to market their production, improve professional qualification, instil scientific recommendations in production and extend practical experience by organizing seminars;
promote vegetable and potato consumption.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: EU Civil Dialogue for fruit and vegetables
